name: service.toml

entity.name: Service
entity.description: A type of care service offered

rawContent:
# Service Entity
# Types of care services offered

[entity]
id = "service"
name = "Service"
description = "A type of care service offered"
table = "services"

[[fields]]
name = "id"
type = "string"
required = true
unique = true
description = "Service type identifier"

[[fields]]
name = "name"
type = "string"
required = true
description = "Service name"

[[fields]]
name = "description"
type = "text"
required = true
description = "Service description"

[[fields]]
name = "category"
type = "enum"
values = ["care", "medical", "household", "transport"]
required = true
description = "Service category"

[[fields]]
name = "icon"
type = "string"
required = false
description = "Icon name for UI display"

[implementation]
interface = "ServiceEntity"
file = "src/prototype/factories/index.ts"
mock = "src/prototype/mocks/services.json"
status = "planned"
